titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duties on sumatriptan succinate (bulk and dosage forms).

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Executive Comment Requested from Treasury, Commerce, ITC, USTR.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 10/7/1993--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 1995, the duty on (3-(2-(dimethylamino)ethyl)-N-methyl-1H-indole-5-methanesulphonamide, (1:1) succinate (sumatriptan succinate in bulk and dosage forms).
